## Recent Works

These are some of my latest maps and data visualizations from personal creative projects, work-related reports, and other academic assignments. Included here are any of my contributions to Tidy Tuesday, Map Prompt Monday, 30 Day Map Challenge, and other social media contests. Most of my visualization workflows use ArcGIS Pro, R/RStudio, QGIS, or Python/Jupyter Notebooks.
